author: Thomas Hostler
comment: Love this watchface but would like to be able to have it not show day and date on the dimmed version. It looks messy when notifications are showing or music info for whatever I am playing. If that gets changed this is an instant 5 star. EDIT IN RESPONSE TO DEVELOPER REPLY - Was not negotiating for stars at all, simply giving reasons why I didn't give it 5 stars in case anyone else was interested in buying it and wanted an honest review as for me that issue is a deal breaker.

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Feedback can be sent via email.  We do not negotiate stars.  If you're unhappy we can issue you a refund.  Forzaonestudios@gmail.com

title: Great apart from one thing

author: karen barclay
comment: Had probs loading due to android wear not this app but dev responded swiftly to help out. Now working fine and design looks really nice. Very impressed with customer service too.  Thanks
title: Perfect look on moto 360

author: Jared H.
comment: The description stated this was customizable, which I took to mean you could replace widgets like phone battery with steps or weather. The only thing this allows to be customized is the color and date/time format. It looks very cool, though, so I may keep it.
title: Decent

author: Rene Jacobsen
comment: I really like this watch face, but it is missing an option to lock the color. Also the 2 empty spots could have been used for weather information.
title: Great watch face but!

author: John Soccer
comment: I'm a huge Marvel fan and geeking out hard right now lol.
title: Tony Stark

author: Duane Harrison
comment: I don't like this watch face my date and month does not show up I have a square watch face very hard to see the numbers I think this watch face is made for a round watch

author: Ken Ashlin
comment: I didn't notice that it wouldn't work on my Samsung Gear 2 until after I paid for and downloaded it. Can I get a refund?

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Sure buddy.  Just email us the Google transaction # and we will get you refunded.  forzaonestudios@gmail.com

author: Andy Cooper
comment: This is the watch face I have been looking for.  However, if there was an option to turn off the colour changing it would be 5 stars.
title: Finally, an Iron Man watch face...

author: Patrick
comment: Awesomeness.  Just had to update my review.  Months later still looking and working great.

author: Dr. Kimm Kelly
comment: This app is crap!  Doesn't at all

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content:
We can help you.  Email us at forzaonestudios@gmail.com
Thanks!

author: Tyson Porter
comment: Yes! Just need a way to lock the set watch face
title: Perrrfect

author: Mike Forslund
comment: Amazing customer service and support. Great products!

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review Mike.

title: Beautiful

author: Paul Swain
comment: Realy like the watch face
title: Cool face

author: ira jackson
comment: Great looking watch face only problem is both battery % are 5% off to the low side. Update after  uninstall and re stall it now shows correct battery %. Up grading to 5 stares.
title: Iman watch face

author: Richard Weber
comment: After some time the date and time settings reset and has to be manually reconfigured. Also the AM/PM indicator is quite useless with 24-hours mode.

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Hi Richard, we are following up to see if the update fixed your issue?

title: Date and time settings reset

author: Garret Tanner
comment: This watchface looks awesome on my Moto 360. With just a glance I get not only the time, but the battery percentage of my phone and watch, and the date. I had to contact the developer for a minor problem I had, and the customer service was excellent.

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Thanks Garret, glad you're a happy customer.

title: Awesome Watchface

author: Thom Luxford
comment: Love the triangular symmetry, very pleasing to the eye how it guides the eyes to the time indicator, like good picture. Rule of thirds for the win!

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Thank you for such a detailed review Thom.

title: Triangular symmetry

author: Nilam Kaushik
comment: Customization at its very best. Keep it up devs.
title: Just what i was looking for

author: Lucas Harper
comment: Only change a few features
title: Restricting

author: Scott Morris
comment: Instantly went for the refund

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: We can issue you a refund - can you give us details Scott on what you didnt like? We would need your Google transaction ID. forzaonestudios@gmail.com.

title: Looks terrible

author: Japes Ash
comment: Doesn't run on my watch... can't refund either... tsk

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: We haven't heard from you Japes.  We didn't see any email from you asking for a refund.  Here it is Forzaonestudios@gmail.com  Include the google transaction number and what watch you have.  Thanks!

title: Looks great but....
